name: First Blood
description: Completed your first sprint submission. Welcome to the community!

name: Getting Serious
description: Completed 5 sprint submissions. You're building momentum!

name: Sprint Veteran
description: Completed 10 sprints. A true design warrior!

name: Feedback MVP
description: Provided the most helpful feedback in a sprint. Your insights make everyone better.

name: Top Rated
description: Achieved the highest average vote score in a sprint. Excellence recognized!

name: Consistent Voter
description: Voted on every submission in a sprint. Your participation strengthens the community.

name: Feedback Champion
description: Provided 20+ pieces of feedback across sprints. A true mentor to peers.

name: Typography Master
description: Reached level 5+ in Typography skill. Your type game is strong!

name: Accessibility Advocate
description: Reached level 5+ in Accessibility skill. Making design inclusive for all.

name: Helpful Peer
description: Received 10+ helpful marks on your feedback. Your insights truly resonate.

name: Early Adopter
description: Joined during the platform's first 6 months. A founding community member!

name: Design System Pro
description: Reached level 5+ in Design Systems skill. Building consistency at scale.

name: Rapid Prototyper
description: Submitted within the first 48 hours of 5 sprints. Speed and quality combined!

name: Perfectionist
description: Received 5-star ratings in all categories on a submission. Flawless execution!

name: Well Rounded
description: Reached level 3+ in all 20 skills. A true design generalist!
